com.skobbler.ngx.navigation
Class SKCrossingDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.navigation.SKCrossingDescriptor

public class SKCrossingDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

Class that contains information about how to generate visual advice images.

Version:
2.3
